WorkItem.Description:
Loading my fire mage, shows my stats completely different to what they are in-game. Now I understand this may be due to it possibly wanting to take into account full raid buffs, but I doubt that. For example it shows my characters' hit at 14.28% when in-game it shows 16.97%. Attached is my character profile.
Â 
Using Rawr WPF 4.3.0
WorkItem.Summary: Fire Mage character sheet stats wrong

Comments.Message: I would like to add that this severely affects optimization.
I'm guessing this was loaded from Rawr addon? It looks like there is currently an issue with that, until we fix it try importing from battle.net.

Yes it was from the addon. I would load from battlenet, but I like having RAWR optimize my gear with all I have for a better output rather than just what I have equipped. But I guess I can make do with what I have working atm.
I just pushed a new release on curse so it should be available as soon as it gets approved.
Thanks, I'll test it as soon as I get a chance.
